params.description: Description of the work to be done
params.splits: Array of splits in basis points (must sum to 10000)
params.totalAmount: Total USDC amount for the escrow

returns.escrowId: The ID of the created escrow

params.workAccepted: True if work is accepted, false to refund client

params.proofURI: URI pointing to work proof (IPFS, etc.)

approveWork(uint256).notice: Approve submitted work and enable payouts

autoRelease(uint256).notice: Auto-release funds after deadline if no dispute raised

cancelEscrow(uint256).notice: Cancel escrow before work submission (client only)

createEscrow(address[],uint256[],uint256.notice: Create a new escrow for agent collaboration

raiseDispute(uint256).notice: Raise a dispute on submitted work

setArbiter(uint256,address).notice: Set an arbiter for dispute resolution
